participant_1.background:
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.
I like to spend my free time building things with my son.
i have a gambling problem.
i would rather read a book than watch a movie.
i ve been in a relationship for 2 years.

participant_2.background:
I treasure a handmade ring from my brother.
I have been deployed away from home for a long time, and I miss my family.
I have a soft spot for crooners, probably because of my grandmother's love for Frank Sinatra.
i cannot do math.
i ve never met my father.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! I am trying to spend more time with my son, so we are building a lot of things together.
That sounds wonderful! I miss my family so much right now. I have been deployed away from home for a long time.
I am so sorry to hear that! I am sure they miss you very much too.
Thank you. I treasure a handmade ring from my brother. It is the only thing I have to remind me of him when I am away.
That is a beautiful sentiment. I am sure he loves you very much.
I hope so. I have never met my father. I think he left before I was born.
That must be hard. I am sure your mother loves you very much.
She does. She is the best.
I am glad to hear that. I have been in a relationship for 2 years. I love spending time with my partner.
That is wonderful! I am glad you are happy.
Thank you! I hope you have a great day!
